question: Who launched full-fledged intelligence wing of Sashastra Seema Bal (SSB)?
explanation: The Union Ministry of Home Affairs Shri Rajnath Singh launched full-fledged intelligence wing of Sashastra Seema Bal (SSB). The intelligence wing will gather actionable information in a bid to enhance operational efficiency. Around 650 field and staff agents to gather actionable information and SSB's intelligence wing personnel will be deployed on India-Nepal and India-Bhutan where there are no restrictions on movement of people on either side due to visa-free regime.
